thread.title: Pregnant Ciara puts on amazing lip-sync performance as she dances around the kitchen to Whitney Houston classic
thread.title_full: Pregnant Ciara puts on amazing lip-sync performance as she dances around the kitchen to Whitney Houston classic

author: Vicki Newman
title: Pregnant Ciara puts on amazing lip-sync performance as she dances around the kitchen to Whitney Houston classic
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Ciara is a girl who knows how to have fun. 
The singer put on an amazing lip-sync display as she danced around the house to Whitney Houston classic I'm Every Woman. 
Ciara, who is expecting her first child with husband Russell Wilson, let her hair down and showed off her baby bump as she sang into a wooden spatula and danced the night away. 
The 31-year-old, who is already mum to her toddler Future Zahir with her ex-fiance Future, showed she's still got what it takes to captivate an audience. Read More Pregnant Ciara shows off her growing baby bump in stunning gown as she shuns maternity wear for AMAs Ciara put on an amazing lip-sync display (Photo: ciara/Instagram) 
The star kicks off the video by pulling her shirt down off her shoulder and mouthing the words to Whitney's song into the camera. 
Shaking her groove thing, she grabs a spatula and does her best diva impersonation as she shimmies across the kitchen floor. 
She then dances into the living room where son Future is sitting on the couch. 
She jumps up onto the sofa before crouching down to give him a kiss, then continues on with he performance. She used a spatula as a microphone (Photo: ciara/Instagram) 
Ciara then dances by her husband who throws her an adoring look before she leans in a doorway to rub her growing baby bump. 
She ends the video with an amazing dance sequence. 
She posted the video to Instagram, saying: "#ImEveryWoman! It's All In Me! Choreography by @galenhooks Filmed by @timmilgram" 
It's already been viewed more than one million times and was a hit with her fans. Her fans loved the clip (Photo: ciara/Instagram) 
Her fans couldn't get enough of the clip. 
One wrote: "love it so much! I think you should do something like this with the kids! It would be so cute! I will choreograph!" 
Another said: "Omg this is life " 
And another wrote: "Yesss!! U beta work wit that belly hunny!!!" [sic] Like us on Facebook
